SHIT GAME. No graphic options, no controller settings, shitty music WTF

to change resolution open:
%:Tony Hawk's Pro Skater HDEngineConfigBaseEngine.ini
and edit lines to desired res:
ResX=1920
ResY=1080

Let's be clearer:

To change gamma (brightness) go to: THSPSHDEngineConfigBaseEngine.ini, and search: "DisplayGamma", must be at least in 2.0.
Gamma range is between 1.6-2.2.

To change game resolution go to: THSPSHDEngineConfigBaseEngine.ini, and search: "resX" and "resY", edit them to whatever you want.
i.e.: resX=1920; resY=1080.

Heads up for anyone who can not save the game.

If you are running Vista/7 this should work for you.

Once you have installed the game (And ticked the create a shortcut on desktop box), every time you launch the game, right click the shortcut and go to "Run as Administrator".

If you don't do that, it will come up during the initial loading of the game that the save file has limited access and the game will not be saved or something like that.

Although to be fairly honest this port is terrible. No options for adjusting settings (unless you edit .ini files etc), poor bails and animation, no fluid combos like the originals had. It's just a very poor release from Activision :(

Stick to Skate or the better Tony Hawk Games!

im using windows 7 64bit and this game is 100% works fine.. the save works and it depends on the character you used.

for whoever thats having difficulties in controller setting, just download program called XPADDER. it will emulate your controller as a keyboard press, so it will work with any computer game, but the drawback you just need to  configure it for every game, 

Also please remember to take snapshot of keyboard layout, it will be used to set your config in xpadder.

XPADDER not free anymore, so grab the cracked or pirated one. Cheers.
